frontmatter.title: NSTextStorage: Crash in didProcessEditing
frontmatter.staticPreview: When you're writing an editor, a common feature is to intercept the user's typing and automatically edit the text, to make writing easier. For example, if we're typing in a list, we might want to automatically insert another bullet point when the user presses enter...
frontmatter.mdxPreview: When you're writing an [editor](https://twitter.com/noahsark769/status/1231077295164538880?s=20), a common feature is to intercept the user's typing and automatically edit the text, to make writing easier. For example, if we're typing in a list, we might want to automatically insert another bullet point when the user presses enter...
